did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Associated Reformed Church of Seneca records, 1807-1924.

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Associated Reformed Church of Seneca (Seneca, N.Y.)

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library

bioghist.head: ORGANIZATIONAL HISTORY
bioghist.p: In 1865 the church's corporate name was changed to the Presbyterian Church of Seneca.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Session meeting minutes (1814-1916); letter of dismission (1839); church register of communicants of the Associated Reformed and Presbyterian church (1807-1881); trustee meeting minutes (1807-1871); subscription lists (1836-1876); correspondence (1808-1863); property related documents (1808-1869); minister related documents (1813-1844); documents related to the case of Thomas Burrell and John Wilson against the church (1859-1867); and miscellaneous financial records (1816-1869)

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Associated Reformed Church of Seneca (Seneca, N.Y.)
